pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 8, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, May 8, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the 2017 National Holocaust Remembrance Day Ceremony.

Canadian War Museum
1 Vimy Place
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive via South entrance no later than 3:00 p.m.
